Name: Salty Seabird Bay
About the game: It's golden age of piracy and somewhere on the high seas there is a legendary bay where all manner of rowdy scallywags gather to wage battle on very important pirate games: for who wins is the king of pirates and who loses is the salty seabird! Four unique game modes Race mode (championship) Mermaids Eight notorious pirate captains to choose from Sharks Multiple settings for each game mode: Modes inside game modes Treasure hunting Swashbuckling original soundtrack Hours of crazy fun local multi-player action... It's good 'ol fun! Pirate cards The Kraken Naval warfare action Drunken Sailor Game modes in Salty Seabird Bay are are easy to learn, but have depth to be to be played for long time. No landlubbers allowed! Salty Seabird Bay is the ultimate local multi-player pirate party game bonanza!
